title: ZAC's Mid Season Update
body:
Does anyone else feel that keeping ZAC scaling off of AP feels like a crappy move when Riot says they like his unique feeling?

Why not make his abilities scale with maximum health?
Ryze does it with Mana, Vlad gains AP for Health and Health for AP.

ZAC is very much situated better than any other champion to have all of his abilities scale with his max or current health.
Current health would making him more of a target in a fight too, which is the idea of a Tank soak up the best of the enemy's damage in order to keep your team from feeling it.

Honestly I don't see any reason for him to continue to have his abilities scale with AP, if his abilities scaled with every 100/500/1000 health, I could see him no longer being such a niche pick and being more fluid in the meta.

replies.body:
I like your idea idea of a champion whose abilities scale with _current HP_ because that would make him a unique champ in terms of "You HAVE to focus the tank"
But also, you don't _have_ to kill him before switching focus to other more high-priority targets, as you lessen his damage when he is small.

This would also mean he has to actually build tank, and not AP/tank hybrid where he one-hits you and has 4000+ hp anyway.

But I'm sure this has big balance repercussions. So i wouldn't throw all my weight behind it without further investigation and crunching the numbers.
As usually HP scaling abilities are very strong.

Jesus, he'd be broken if his abilities scaled from HP.

LOL!
Because his base damages are already ridiculously high.
